title: Mocap - Halloween Animation Library
description: 64 Halloween Motion Capture Animations for Cinematics (Body + Fingers)
longDescription:
A collection of 64 halloween motion capture animations (Body + Fingers) ready for Unreal Engine (UE5 Skeletons, Loops, RootMotion/InPlace). All animations have been recorded and polished for use in cinematics (NOT intended for state machines), although there are many with loop and rootmotion.


VIDEO SHOWCASE: LINK


CONTACT: marketplace@raisedbymonsters.eu


ANIMATIONS LIST WITH DESCRIPTION:

A_H_F_Dance Strange girl dances extravagantly.

A_H_F_EnterHauntedHouse A woman enters a haunted house and looks around scared.

A_H_F_WalkBabyCart Sinister woman carries a baby stroller with a dead baby inside.

A_H_F_WalkCandies Little girl walks balancing a bucket of candy.

A_H_F_WalkKnife Sinister woman walks with a knife in her hand looking for her victim.

A_H_F_WalkMummy Girl walks imitating the mummy.

A_H_F_WalkPossessed_01 Possessed girl walks with spider walks.

A_H_F_WalkPossessed_02 Girl walks possessed by a curse.

A_H_F_WalkWitch Little girl dressed as a witch walks with a broom in her hand.

A_H_M_AskCandies A child holding a bag asks for candy.

A_H_M_AttackAxe Man tries to break a door with an axe to attack his victim.

A_H_M_Attacked Man is attacked by a creature that jumps on his back.

A_H_M_AttackGloveBlades Terrifying creature scratches a wall with its bladed glove to intimidate its victim.

A_H_M_Call_01 Child rings a doorbell for Trick or Treat.

A_H_M_Call_02 Child rings the doorbell and runs out to play a prank.

A_H_M_Chased Man is chased.

A_H_M_Clean A person cleans the grave of a loved one.

A_H_M_CoverGrave Gravedigger pours earth into the grave to close it.

A_H_M_CutPumpkin Man carves a pumpkin to decorate it.

A_H_M_Dead Dead person on the ground.

A_H_M_DecorateHouse A person decorates a house with fake spider webs on a ladder.

A_H_M_Dig Gravedigger digs a grave.

A_H_M_Drag_01 A person is dragged by the legs by a creepy being while trying to resist.

A_H_M_Drag_02 A person is dragged along the ground.

A_H_M_DragZombie Zombie crawls to attack.

A_H_M_EatZombie Zombie eats a dead person on the ground.

A_H_M_ElectroShock Frankenstein is electrocuted.

A_H_F_Escape Possessed girl tries to free herself from the restraints of her bed.

A_H_M_Exorcism Priest practices an exorcism.

A_H_F_Fly Witch flies on a broomstick.

A_H_M_GetOutTomb Zombie comes out of the grave.

A_H_M_GetUpCoffin Vampire rises from his coffin.

A_H_M_Hang Skeleton hanging from a tree.

A_H_M_IDLE_01 Creepy clown waves.

A_H_M_IDLE_02 Alive scarecrow.

A_H_M_IDLE_03 A man stands still and watches his victim with a knife in his hand.

A_H_M_JumpAttack Creature attacks a man by jumping on his back.

A_H_M_LightCandle A person lights a candle to cast a spell.

A_H_M_LookOut Hidden boy watches behind a wall to scare the person coming towards him.

A_H_M_OfferCandies Man throws candy to a child asking for Trick or Treat.

A_H_M_OverFace Vampire covers his face with his cape.

A_H_M_PickUpTelephone A person picks up the phone scared and drops it.

A_H_M_PlayOuija A seated person plays Ouija.

A_H_M_PutOutFire A person sees a poop on fire in the entrance of his house and tries to put it out.

A_H_M_Quarter Person dismembers another.

A_H_M_RideTricycle Sinister puppet rides a tricycle.

A_H_M_RunKnife Ghost face runs with a knife in his hand.

A_H_M_Scare A hidden person jumps to scare another.

A_H_M_Scared_01 Person is scared by another and laughs.

A_H_M_Scared_02 Boy eats popcorn and gets scared.

A_H_M_Scared_03 Frightened person knocks on a closed door.

A_H_M_Scared_04 Frightened person cornered against the wall slides down it.

A_H_M_Stab Psyco man opens the shower curtain and murders a woman who is taking a shower.

A_H_M_StartChainSaw Man starts chainsaw.

A_H_F_Stir Witch stirs the cauldron.

A_H_M_TakeApple A person plays bobbing for apples.

A_H_M_TakeCandy Bully boy takes candy from a child and pushes him.

A_H_M_TellStory Boy sitting on the floor tells horror story with a flashlight on his face.

A_H_M_Throw_01 Boy throws eggs at a house.

A_H_M_Throw_02 Boy throws toilet paper at a tree.

A_H_M_TransformWolfMan Man transforms into a werewolf and howls.

A_H_M_TrySleep Frightened child in bed covers himself with a sheet.

A_H_M_WalkShovel Gravedigger walks with a shovel on his shoulder.

A_H_M_WalkZombie Zombie walks.


We hope you enjoy the pack and if you have any question/queries please contact us :


Email : marketplace@raisedbymonsters.eu
technicalDetails:
Features: 64 motion capture animations halloween themed. Include body and fingers animations.


Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 64

Animation types: Root Motion/In-place

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
